attributes.action: We call for the law to be changed to allow number plates to to show any UK Country Flag and any badge of a Brisith Army Regiment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel it is a disgrace that drivers can not display regimental badges of the Brisith Army and show there support for our troops on car Number plates indeed some old soilders have been fined and made to replace numbers plates and it should stop NOW
